org.openimaj.image.processing

Class CLImageProcessor<I extends Image<?,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.CLImageProcessor<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Type of Image being processed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<I>, Processor<I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLConvolve2D

    public class CLImageProcessor<I extends Image<?,I>>
extends Object
implements ImageProcessor<I>
    Base ImageProcessor for GPGPU accelerated processing.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
